items.summary: Add the userâ€™s latest round red "PATENTED" logo as a new static generated image asset (background-removed/transparent) under frontend/public/assets/generated, to be used only for the Upload tab empty-state animation.
Update the Upload tab empty-state UI (when no workbook is loaded) to use the new round red PATENTED logo asset, render it centered, and make it slightly smaller than the current image size.

Change the Upload tab empty-state logo animation so it continuously rotates in a single direction (no direction reversal) while preserving the existing flip effect as requested; the rotation must be smooth, slow, loop forever, and must be on-screen only (must not impact any export generation).

Fix PDF export layout so no text overlaps anywhere, including header contact lines, footer lines, and table cell content; ensure multi-page exports remain readable with consistent margins and spacing.
Fix in-app UI formatting issues that can cause text overlap in the visible application (non-PDF), adjusting spacing/wrapping/alignment as needed while keeping all user-facing text in English.
